requirements.summary: Remove the “Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai” watermark text and outbound caffeine.ai link from the global footer across all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer displays any text or links referencing “caffeine.ai”.
No outbound link to https://caffeine.ai/ is present in the rendered footer DOM across all routes.
The footer still renders without layout breakage (e.g., copyright and other footer items remain aligned and readable).

file_operations.description: Update the footer markup to delete the “Built with ❤️ using” text fragment and remove the outbound anchor linking to caffeine.ai (including any dynamic URL construction), while preserving the remaining footer content (e.g., © year / app name and GitHub icon) and alignment.
